duties_responsibilities.duty: Collaborate across departments to identify and drive engineering efficiencies to meet gross margin and OPEX goals.
Develop financial models to provide insights and actionable opportunities for engineering prioritization and strategy.
Conduct financial analyses to provide business health insights, trends, and articulate findings to finance and engineering leadership.
Drive regular key performance indicator (KPI) reviews and support the finance rhythm of business.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business, Finance, Engineering, Operations, or equivalent experience. (Master's preferred)
